name: Isaac And His Another Bad Luck (Greatest Worst Games i made)
name_original: Isaac And His Another Bad Luck (Greatest Worst Games i made)
description:
This game was intended for my friend to play, but my Monkey brain uploaded the whole public in itch.io because why not?

Story: You play Isaac Miller, A combat medic who is the last remaining member of the Marine ops, you tried to kill the Developer of this game, Naufal and His 3 Clones, you failed and get shot in the head and fall to your coffin, but then some random guy resurrect you back from the dead because he hates his job. You became an Undead and now must take revenge for whatever reason.

Controls: EVERY FPS GAME EVER. ITS SO EASY TO REMEMBER DINGUS

Overall this game i created sucks balls
